alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:01PM EDT until July 16 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. MARYS...WEST CENTRAL CALVERT...SOUTHEASTERN PRINCE GEORGES AND NORTHEASTERN CHARLES COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Golden Beach, or near Hallowing Point, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Waldorf, Prince Frederick, Hallowing Point, Golden Beach, Huntingtown, Hughesville, Baden, Mechanicsville, Charlotte Hall, Aquasco, Bryantown, Benedict, Eagle Harbor and Barstow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys
